primary color: #FFFFFF : Primary color(App Bar) of the app. It must be given in hex.
accent color: #4285F4 : Accent Color(dividers and secondary elements.) It must be given in hex
background color: #FFFFFF : The color of the list items. It must be given in hex
icon color: #F4B400 : The color of the star Icon
app title: App Title : The top title of the app, it must be a string
brightness: light : The brightness theme. It must either be the string light or dark
font: https://github.com/google/fonts/raw/master/apache/roboto/Roboto-Regular.ttf : The font that will be used. Can take the link of any ttf file only as a string

tabs.tab title: Tab 1 : The Title of the Tab

items.time: 10:00: Time of  event. It must be given as a string though no format required
items.event title: Event 1 : Title of the Event. Must be given as a string
items.description: Tab 1 Event 1 Details: Description of event. Must be given as a string
